description: Defines acceptance criteria for the solution.
template: Define a set of clear and testable acceptance criteria for the proposed solution. These criteria should be specific, measurable, achievable, relevant, and time-bound (SMART), if possible. They will be used to validate that the solution meets the requirements. Respond ONLY as a compact JSON object with the key `acceptance_md`, containing the criteria as a Markdown checklist.
constraints: The `acceptance_md` value must be valid Markdown.
Use a Markdown checklist for the criteria.
